description: This file defines a React functional component named QuizBuilder that provides a UI for creating or editing quizzes by adding questions and answers, managing state and handling form submission.

methods.name: QuizBuilder()
methods.description: React functional component for building or editing quizzes with inputs for quiz title and questions.

methods.name: addQuestion
methods.description: Function to append a new question-answer pair to the questions state array.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Form submission handler that prevents default behavior; placeholder for persisting the quiz.
